subject: College Athletics
Extortion and Blackmail
Basketball (College)
Colleges and Universities
Video Recordings and Downloads
organizations: Rutgers, The State University of New Jersey
lead_paragraph: Eric Murdock, who made public the video footage showing Coach Mike Rice’s abusive behavior toward players, is being investigated for possible extortion, a university official said.
snippet: Eric Murdock, who made public the video footage showing Coach Mike Rice’s abusive behavior toward players, is being investigated for possible extortion, a university official said.
